title: Cédric Vidonne
text:
Information Management Officer at UNHCR specialized in data visualization and mapping.
Proud creator of the UNHCR Data Visualization Platform and its related guidelines, recommendations on chart selection and tools to build branded graphics.
Recently started my R journey, making more and more visualizations using ggplot2 and being audacious enough to build some R packages.
